comment.text: "Title for a view tile section, used to filter and display room types in a home page."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'مربعات متساوية الحجم' (murabba'at mutasawiyah al-hajm) translates to 'squares of equal size'. While technically describing tiles, it's a very literal and verbose translation of the single word 'Tiles'. A more natural and concise translation would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more concise translation like 'بلاطات' (balatat - tiles/slabs) or 'قطع' (qita' - pieces/sections). The best choice depends on the specific context of how 'Tiles' is used.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Клетки" (Kletki) while potentially meaning 'cells' in a more general sense, isn't the most appropriate translation for 'Tiles' in this context, which typically refers to visual elements on a screen or interface. A better translation would depend on the exact meaning of 'Tiles' in the software, but options like 'плочки' (plotchki) or 'плочки' (plotchki) for 'tiles' or 'елементи' (elementi) for 'elements' might be more accurate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'плочки' (plotchki) or 'елементи' (elementi) as a more accurate translation depending on context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Zellen' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Tiles' in the context of file viewing. 'Zellen' typically refers to cells (e.g., in a spreadsheet or biology). 'Tiles' refers to a visual arrangement of elements.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Kacheln' as a more accurate translation for 'Tiles', referring to visual tiles or graphical elements.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Iconos" while technically meaning 'icons', doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'Tiles' in the context of file viewing. 'Tiles' refers to a visual arrangement of images or representations of files, and 'Iconos' is a more general term for icons.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like "Miniaturas" (thumbnails), "Paneles" (panels), or a more descriptive phrase depending on the specific UI design and intended meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Kuvakkeet' can mean icons, in the context of 'Files:ViewTiles,' 'Tiles' likely refers to visual representations of files (like thumbnails or preview images). 'Kuvakkeet' is a more general term for icons and might not accurately convey the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'Laatat' or 'Pienoiskuvat' which more closely represent the concept of visual file tiles.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Italian translation "Tegole" refers to roof tiles, not the general term "Tiles" which likely refers to graphical tiles or UI elements.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Piastrelle", "Mosaici", or a more contextual translation depending on the specific application.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation "제목" (Je-mok) translates to "Title" and does not accurately represent the English word "Tiles". "Tiles" refers to visual elements arranged in a grid-like format, typically in a user interface.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "타일" (T'ail), which directly translates to "tiles", or "이미지 타일" (Image Tiles) for more clarity depending on the context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: 'ຫົວຂໍ້' translates to 'headings' or 'titles', which doesn't accurately represent the English word 'Tiles' in the context of files and visual representation. 'Tiles' refers to visual blocks or sections within a file view.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translations like 'ແຜ່ນ' (paen - panels/sheets), 'ກະດານ' (kradan - board/grid), or a more descriptive phrase depending on the specific visual context of 'Tiles'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: 'Elementi' does not accurately convey the meaning of 'Tiles' in the context of file viewing. 'Tiles' refers to a visual representation of files arranged in a grid-like format. 'Elementi' translates to 'elements' which is more general and lacks the visual context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Flīzes' or 'Paveidi' as alternatives. 'Flīzes' specifically refers to tiles, and 'Paveidi' can suggest a visual layout of items.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation "Tytuły" translates to "Titles" which doesn't accurately reflect the meaning of "Tiles" in the context of UI elements or visual representations.  "Tiles" typically refers to individual blocks of content or images arranged in a grid. A more accurate translation would be something like 'Kafelki' or 'Bloki'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'Kafelki' or 'Bloki' as a more accurate translation of 'Tiles'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Títulos" for "Tiles" is not the most accurate or natural. "Títulos" typically refers to titles of documents or media. "Tiles" in this context likely refers to visual tiles or blocks of content.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Azulejos," "Blocos," or "Pastilhas" depending on the specific visual context.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Azulejos' can mean tiles, it often refers to decorative ceramic tiles, not just any kind of tiles. 'Tiles' in the context of a software interface (Files:ViewTiles) likely refers to a more generic term.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Pastilhas' or 'Blocos' as more generic alternatives. Context is needed to confirm the most appropriate translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'කොටු' (kotu) can mean 'tiles,' it's a general term for 'pieces' or 'sections.' A more precise translation for 'Tiles' in the context of a user interface (like a file view) might be something more specific. 'ක්රිඩා' (kriida) could be closer depending on the visual representation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ක්රිඩා' (kriida) or a more contextually appropriate term depending on the visual representation of the tiles.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian (Cyrillic) translation "Наслови" typically translates to "Titles" or "Headings", not "Tiles". "Tiles" in this context likely refers to visual elements, like image tiles or a grid of tiles.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Плички" (Plichki) which is closer to 'tiles' or "Крпе" (Krepe) depending on the specific visual meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Naslovi" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Tiles" in the context of file viewing. "Naslovi" generally means 'Headings' or 'Titles'. 'Tiles' in this context likely refers to the visual representation of files as tiles or thumbnails.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Kocke" (cubes/blocks) or a more descriptive phrase depending on the specific UI element.
